DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass effectiveness force exercise aerobic exercise program , utilize cycling activity , specific gait parameter balance individual Parkinson 's Disease ( PD ) . Design : pilot , feasibility , randomize control , evaluator blind . Subjects : Twenty four patient idiopathic PD Hoehn Yahr ( H & Y ) stage II III . Intervention : Participants randomly assign one two exercise group , force exercise self select exercise , cycle machine three time week 8 week . Both group exercise aerobic intensity level keep heart rate 60-80 % heart rate max . Outcomes : Gait parameter step length , width , variability measure GAITRite ; 6 Minute Walk Test ; mini-BESTest ( balance test ) ; exercise tolerance via Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System ( PROMIS ) scale .
